name: Glimpse of Madness
description:
SOON WE’LL START A CROWDFUNDING CAMPAIGN ON INDIEGOGO

follow us and support us please!

OVERVIEW

Glimpse of Madness is a visually-rich 2D point and click adventure game inspired by all the ’80 & ’90 classic games.

The game deals primarily with the supernatural world, but combines this with more lighthearted and fun themes.

Will you help Ana Lucia to solve the mystery of her parents’ death?

FEATURES

• Game engine developed through Visionaire 5 engine, by Visionaire Studio UG

• 45/50 different locations in which to move, interacting with multiple objects and characters

• Bilingual texts and interface (English & Italian) plus others based on the Indiegogo campaign

• Puzzles to solve in order to proceed with the adventure

• Dialogues with different characters, to discover useful clues and reach the solution

• Accurate movements of the various characters, depending on the action required

• Presence of spoken audio in at least four languages (English,  Italian, French & German)

• Sounds and music by Eric Matyas (www.soundimage.org)

• Versions of the game in Windows and Mac format

• Digital download plus many other features like walkthrough, illustrated artbook etc.

 

The partial game demo of the adventure (7 locations), in Windows and Mac formats, is available on the website glimpseofmadness.com .
